member.param: The instance to be accessed as an .

An optional existing thread identifier for the chat session. This serves as a default, and may be overridden per call to or via the property. If no thread ID is provided via either mechanism, a new thread will be created for the request.
member.returns: An instance configured to interact with the specified agent and thread.

The unique identifier of the assistant with which to interact.

An optional existing thread identifier for the chat session. This serves as a default, and may be overridden per call to or via the property. If no thread ID is provided via either mechanism, a new thread will be created for the request.
member.exception: is empty or composed entirely of whitespace.
member.returns: An instance configured to interact with the specified agent and thread.
